default="no"> <$button tooltip="Maximize the story river" aria-label="maximize river" class=<>> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> {{$:/xp/images/maximize}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> <$text text="maximize river"/> <$list filter="[[$:/state/sidebar]get[text]] +[else[yes]!match[no]]" variable="ignore"> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/sidebar" text="no"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/leftopentab" text="hide"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/compatible-with-Stories-plugin.css" tags=""/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/core/ui/SideBar/Open" tags="$:/tags/SideBar"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/tab/sidebar--595412856" text="$:/core/ui/SideBar/Open"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/storyleft" <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/temp"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/leftopentab/executed" text="yes"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/maximize-river" $value="yes"/> <$reveal state="$:/state/maximize-river" type="nomatch" text="no" default="no"> <$button tooltip="Un-maximize" aria-label="unmaximize river" class=<>> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> $tiddler="$:/state/sidebar" text="yes"/> <$reveal state="$:/state/leftopentab/executed" type="match" text="yes" default="no"> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/leftopentab" text="show"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/compatible-with-Stories-plugin.css" tags="$:/tags/Stylesheet"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/core/ui/SideBar/Open" tags=""/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/storyright" text="calc({{$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/temp!!storyright-default}} + {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/storyleft}})"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/leftopentab/executed" text="no"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/maximize-river" $value="no"/>

$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/Menu.title: $:/xp/LeftOpenTab/Menu
$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/Menu.text:
\whitespace trim \define lingo-base() $:/language/CloseAll/ \define drop-actions() <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $subfilter="+[insertbefore:currentTiddler]"/> <$action-listops $tiddler=<<_otherStory>> $subfilter="-[]"/> \end \define placeholder()
\end \define droppable-item(button) \whitespace trim <$droppable actions=<>> <>
$button$
\end \define open-tiddler-list()
addsuffix[-primaryList]] -[[$:/temp/advancedsearch/selected-item]get[text]] +[then[]else[tc-list-item-selected]] }}}> <$list filter="[list]" history=<> storyview="pop">
<$macrocall $name="droppable-item" button="""<$button message="tm-close-tiddler" tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Close/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Close/Caption}} class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini">{{$:/core/images/close-button}} <$link to={{!!title}}><$view field="title"/>"""/>
<$tiddler tiddler=""> <$macrocall $name="droppable-item" button="""<$button message="tm-close-all-tiddlers" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini" style="padding:3px 0 0 0;margin-left:0.6em;"><>"""/>
\end
{{$:/language/SideBar/Open/Caption}}   {{$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/button}}
<$set name="_otherStory" filter="[enlist{$:/_sq/Stories/StoriesList!!list}] -[]" select="0"> <>
<$reveal state="!!leftopentab-title-class" type="match" text="leftopentab-title-word">
Right Column
<$set name="_otherStory" value=<> > <$set name="tv-story-list" filter="[enlist{$:/_sq/Stories/StoriesList!!list}] -[]" select="0"> <$set name="tv-history-list" filter="[enlist{$:/_sq/Stories/HistoriesList!!list}] -[]" select="0"> <$navigator story=<> history=<> > <>
<$transclude tiddler="$:/_sq/Stories/Templates/StoryToggleMenu"/>

{{$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/Stylesheet!!storyriver-padding-left}}) /* $:/xp/LeftOpenTab */" /> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/storyright" text="calc({{$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/temp!!storyright-default}} + {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/storyleft}})"/> <$list filter="[title[$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/temp]is[tiddler]]"> <$button set="$:/state/leftopentab" setTo="hide" tooltip="Restore open tab" aria-label="Restore open tab" class=<>> <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> {{$:/xp/images/right-open-tab}} <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> <$text text="left open tab"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/compatible-with-Stories-plugin.css" tags=""/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/core/ui/SideBar/Open" tags="$:/tags/SideBar"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/tab/sidebar--595412856" text="$:/core/ui/SideBar/Open"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/storyleft" text={{$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/temp!!storyleft-default}} /> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/storyright" text={{$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/temp!!storyright-default}} /> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/temp"/>

$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/compatible-with-Storie.title: $:/xp/LeftOpenTab/compatible-with-Stories-plugin.css

$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/readme.title: $:/xp/LeftOpenTab/readme
$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/readme.text:
!! ~LeftOpenTab 左置开启选项卡

A button to put the [[Open|$:/core/ui/SideBar/Open]] tab to the left. Click the button again to restore to the default position.

!! Settings

{{$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/settings}}

!! Dependents

* $:/plugins/sq/Stories

!! See also

TWaddle's  [[LeftBar|http://leftbar.tiddlyspot.com/]] plugin

$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/settings.title: $:/xp/LeftOpenTab/settings
$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/settings.caption: ~LeftOpenTab Settings
$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/settings.text:
\define dropdown-leftopentab-title()
<$select tiddler="$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/Menu" field="leftopentab-title-class">
<option value="leftopentab-title-line">Line</option>
<option value="leftopentab-title-semicircle">Semi Circle</option>
<option value="leftopentab-title-square">Square</option>
<option value="leftopentab-title-word">Word</option>
</$select>
\end

| ''Width'' for ~LeftOpenTab|^<$edit-text tiddler="$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/Stylesheet" field="width" size=6/> <$button set="$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/Stylesheet!!width" setTo="256px" tooltip="Reset to default" aria-label="reset to default">Reset</$button> |
| ''padding-right'' of ~LeftOpenTab|^<$edit-text tiddler="$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/Stylesheet" field="padding-right" size=6/> <$button set="$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/Stylesheet!!padding-right" setTo="14px" tooltip="Reset to default" aria-label="reset to default">Reset</$button> |
| ''Style'' for ~LeftOpenTab|^<<dropdown-leftopentab-title>> |
| Show scrollbar|<$checkbox tiddler="$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/Stylesheet" field="scrollbar-display" checked="inherit" unchecked="none" default="none"/> {{$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/Stylesheet!!scrollbar-display}} |
| Set [[storyleft default value|$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/storyleft]]|^<$edit-text tiddler="$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/Stylesheet" field="storyleft-default" size=6/> <$button set="$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/Stylesheet!!storyleft-default" setTo="0px" tooltip="Reset to default" aria-label="reset to default">Reset</$button> |
| Set [[storyright default value |$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/storyright]]|^<$edit-text tiddler="$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/Stylesheet" field="storyright-default" size=6/> <$button set="$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/Stylesheet!!storyright-default" setTo="770px" tooltip="Reset to default" aria-label="reset to default">Reset</$button> |
